description: This file defines a React component named ProtectedRoute that guards nested routes based on user authentication and role. It uses React Router for navigation and a custom AuthContext for authentication state.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ requireAdmin = false, redirectTo = "/login" })
methods.description: React functional component that enforces authentication and authorization rules for nested routes.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ requireAdmin = false, redirectTo = "\/login" }) {$/
